toolbarConfig.description: The relevant configuration of the toolbar at the bottom
toolbarConfig.description_zh: 底部 toolbar 的相关配置

isPageScroll.description: The scrolling method is page scrolling, and if the component is used as an overlay, this parameter must be set to false
isPageScroll.description_zh: 滚动方式为页面滚动，若组件作为浮层使用，该参数需设为 false

needToolbar.description: Whether the bottom toolbar is required, if you use the developer-defined bottom toolbar, this parameter needs to be set to false
needToolbar.description_zh: 是否需要底部 toolbar ，若使用开发者自定义的底部 toolbar ，该参数需设为 false

addComment.description: It is used to call up the comment publisher to post a comment, and the post is successfully inserted into the first item of the list, and scrolls to the top of the list
addComment.description_zh: 用于调起评论发布器发布评论，发布成功插入列表第一条，且滚动到列表顶部

detailPath.description: Click the path of the detail page that a single comment redirects, if it is not configured, the redirect will not occur, and the configuration is premised on the fact that the list and details are both page-level
detailPath.description_zh: 点击单条评论跳转的详情页页面 path ，若没有配置则不会发生跳转；配置的前提是列表与详情均是页面级

isFolded.description: Whether to collapse the list, the default is full display
isFolded.description_zh: 是否折叠列表，默认全展示

foldNum.description: The maximum number of entries displayed in the collapsed list is 3 by default and 10 at most
foldNum.description_zh: 折叠后列表展示最大条数，默认 3 条，最多 10 条

viewMorePath.description: Pass in the page path where the comment component is placed, such as '/pages/list/index', and the redirect logic will be triggered inside the component
viewMorePath.description_zh: 传入放置评论组件的页面路径，如'/pages/list/index'，组件内部会触发跳转逻辑

viewMoreStyle.description: The style of "All xx Articles" currently only supports developer-defined font colors
viewMoreStyle.description_zh: 『全部 xx 条』的样式，目前只支持开发者自定义字体颜色

onClickComment.description: If you bind an event to click a single comment, it will be triggered when you click a single comment, and the returned data will be {status, data:{srid}}
onClickComment.description_zh: 绑定点击单条评论的事件，点击单条评论时触发，返回数据为{status, data:{srid}}

onViewMore.description: If you need to perform other operations in addition to page jumping, you can use this callback, or if it is a floating layer, you can also use this callback to customize the interaction logic
onViewMore.description_zh: 绑定点击更多事件，若除了页面跳转还需要其他操作，可通过该回调执行；若为浮层，也可使用该回调自定义交互逻辑

onReply.description: Triggered when a comment is successfully published, the return data is {status, data:{srid}}
onReply.description_zh: 评论发布成功时触发，返回数据为 {status, data:{srid}}
